dialog.text: BLADES OF EXILE HELP: MAGIC BARRIERS
There are a wide variety of magical walls and barriers which you can create and will encounter...

Wall of Fire - The weakest wall. Short lived and low damage.
Wall of Force - Does more damage than a Wall of Fire and lasts a bit longer.

Wall of Ice - Does as much damage as a Wall of Force, but lasts much longer.
Wall of Blades - Long lasting, and does the most damage of the wall spells.
Stinking Cloud - Lasts a short time, and curses anyone who enters.

Web - Lasts until walked through. Slows down the victim, and interfers with attacks. Pause to clean off webs.
Antimagic Field - Spells cannot be casts while in this, nor may they be targeted into it. It fades eventually.

Fire Barrier - Permanent. Only removable by Dispel Barrier spell. Damages anyone who walks into it. Blocks quickfire.
Force Barrier - Like Fire Barrier, but cannot be moved through.
Sleep Wall - Walking through can put character to sleep. Very dangerous.
Barrels, Crates - Can be pushed around. Have items in them sometimes.
Quickfire - The most deadly of the barriers, once created it spreads through the dungeon/town destroying everything. It can only be blocked by the two barrier spells. Antimagic fields slow it down.
